reviewText:
Really loved this gripping thriller.  Excellent cast  of actors.  Please tell me that there's a season 2 please!!!
I had already had a sneak preview on TV but I was keen to see the whole thing all the way through - non stop

Carefully crafted suspense with great casting that doesn't have to rely on lewdity, nudity or crudity for the story line. I only have a USA player so I had to watch this through other means, but I have no hesitation in recommending it. I watched all 4 episodes in one sitting, which I haven't done in years. Great debut for new actress as main character. I discovered it because I was looking for more Dervla. Will keep an eye out for more like it.
